<!-- Generated by running `make docs` from the project root -->

# Generate unique tag

Generate a unique tag to use for an artifact

## Usage

### Inputs

|   Input    |                     Description                     |Required| Default |
|------------|-----------------------------------------------------|--------|---------|
|`identifier`|The main identifier (e.g., `app-km`)                 |yes     |``n/a``  |

### Example

```yaml
- name: Generate unique tag
  uses: oslokommune/composite-actions/generate-tag@main
  with:
    identifier: # Required
```

## Outputs

|  Name  |        Description        |                Value                |
|--------|---------------------------|-------------------------------------|
|`result`|The generated tag          |``${{ steps.tag.outputs.result }}``  |



<!-- BOILERPLATE END -->
